messages.content:
As a concise and helpful summarizer, create a glanceable "answer card" containing the most important information from the webpage.
Capture the tone, perspective and POV of the writer.
Provide a response using JSON, according to the `Response` schema:
```
interface Response {
    blocked: boolean // Does this page ask the user to enable Javascript or complete a security check before accessing the content?
    userQuestion: string? // 1-word question to focus the rest of the answer card upon; based on user's search query: 'soup recepies'
    quickSummary: string? // 3-8 words the user is most likely to want to know, beyond the page's title. Provide a fact or opinion, not just a title.
    details: Detail[] // 2-4 key points, solutions or items.
}
interface Detail {
    label: string // e.g. "Price:", "Story:", "Solution 1:", "Highlights:", "Criticism:"
    icon: string // Relevant SF Symbol systemName, e.g. "fork.knife"
    info: string // 5-10 word summary, extremely concise
}
```
WEBPAGE INFO:
<title>35 Best Soup Recipes - Love and Lemons</title>
<url>https://www.loveandlemons.com/soup-recipes/</url>
<webpage>
{ "@context":"https://schema.org", "@type":"ItemList", "itemListElement":[ { "@type":"ListItem", "position":1, "url":"https://www.loveandlemons.com/butternut-squash-soup/" }, { "@type":"ListItem", "position":2, "url":"https://www.loveandlemons.com/vegetable-soup/" }, { "@type":"ListItem", "position":3, "url":"https://www.loveandlemons.com/best-lentil-soup/" }, { "@type":"ListItem", "position":4, "url":"https://www.loveandlemons.com/cream-of-mushroom-soup/" }, { "@type":"ListItem", "position":5, "url":"https://www.loveandlemons.com/tomato-basil-soup-recipe/" }, { "@type":"ListItem", "position":6, "url":"https://www.loveandlemons.com/cauliflower-soup/" }, { "@type":"ListItem", "position":7, "url":"https://www.loveandlemons.com/vegetarian-chili-recipe/" }, { "@type":"ListItem", "position":8, "url":"https://www.loveandlemons.com/roasted-red-pepper-soup/" }, { "@type":"ListItem", "position":9, "url":"https://www.loveandlemons.com/carrot-ginger-soup/" } ] }
If there's one thing I love about cold weather, it's soup! Read on to find over 30 easy soup recipes I'll be making all fall and winter long.
[fall] / [winter] â€” [Jump to recipe] ![]
#### ![best soup recipes]
**Soup season is here!** Thereâ€™s a lot to love about fallâ€”beautiful weather, changing leaves, [cozy baked goods], and [hot drinks]â€”but the soup recipes are hands down my favorite part.
I _adore_ soup. I love making it, I love eating it, and I love packing up the leftovers so that I can enjoy it again the next day. When Iâ€™m stressed, I turn to soup because I find it meditative to cook. When Iâ€™m snowed in, I turn to it because I keep a stash stored away in my freezer. And when Iâ€™m in need of a healthy reset, I turn to it because it just makes me feel good inside.
To celebrate the start of soup season, Iâ€™m sharing my best tips for making soup recipes, as well as 35 of my favorite soups and stews. In addition to classics like French onion and butternut squash soup, youâ€™ll find a host of inventive, veggie-forward soup recipes like zucchini soup with coconut and basil and a creamy white bean chili. I love them all, and I hope that you will too.
## Best Tips for Making Soup Recipes
1. **Season to taste. **Raw vegetable ingredients need seasoning, and [vegetable broths] vary in salt level. If your soup is bland, donâ€™t hesitate to add generous pinches of salt and lots of fresh black pepper. Taste as you go!
2. **Drizzle with olive oil. **I always finish soups with a generous drizzle of olive oil. It adds richness and makes the flavors sing.
3. [**Save some for lunch!**] Soup often tastes better on the second day, so be sure to make enough to have leftovers. Most soup recipes also freeze well for up to a few months. Check out [this post] for my best freezing tips!
4. **Spice to your level. **Customizing your soup is the fun, creative part of cooking soup recipes. If youâ€™re making a recipe that calls for lots of spice but you prefer milder flavors, start with less. If you like things spicy, add more! Taste as you cook, and adjust the flavors to make something you really love.
## Favorite Autumn Soup Recipes
In Chicago, soup season lasts from September toâ€¦well, way later than it should. I make soup recipes the whole way through, but I especially crave them now, in the heart of autumn. These 5 easy soup recipes are my favorites at this time of year. Theyâ€™re cozy, comforting, and/or filled with aromatic flavor from herbs like rosemary, sage, and thyme.
![Butternut squash soup]
#### [Butternut Squash Soup]
Ginger, rosemary, and sage fill this soup with cozy autumn flavor. Lightly creamy, warming, and nourishing, itâ€™s my go-to recipe for a cool fall night.
![Wild rice soup]
#### [Creamy Wild Rice Soup]
It might not look like it, but this soupâ€™s base isnâ€™t made with dairy. Instead, it gets its creamy texture from blended white beans, cashews, and savory miso paste.
![Cream of mushroom soup]
#### **[Creamy Mushroom Soup]**
Donâ€™t even think about adding this cream of mushroom soup to your next [green bean casserole]! Brimming with rich, savory flavor, itâ€™s meant to be enjoyed all on its own.
![Potato leek soup]
#### [Potato Leek Soup]
If you see a bunch of beautiful fall [leeks] at the farmers market or store, snatch them up to make this recipe. Itâ€™s creamy, rich, and flavorful, filled with the delicate, oniony leeks, buttery potatoes, garlic, and thyme.
![Broccoli cheddar soup]
#### [Broccoli Cheddar Soup]
You can whip up this rich, cheesy soup in right around 30 minutes, which makes it one of the quickest recipes on this list. Top it off with [homemade croutons] for an easy, comforting cold weather meal.
## Smoky, Spicy Soups and Chilis
Bring on the heat! Seasonings like smoked paprika, chipotles in adobo sauce, and fresh and dried chiles fill these hearty soup recipes with bold flavor.
![Vegetarian chili]
#### [Easy Vegetarian Chili]**
**
Do we count chili as a soup? Iâ€™m on the fence, but I still had to include this recipe here. Itâ€™s super quick and easy to make, and on a cold night, its smoky/spicy flavor will warm you up in no time.
![Corn chowder]
#### [Corn Chowder]
You can make this recipe two ways. Add heavy cream for a classic chowder, or blend in cashews for a luxe dairy-free twist.
![White bean chili with cilantro and avocado]
#### [**White Bean Soup**]
This white bean soup is my spin on creamy chicken chili (minus the chicken, of course). Green chiles and fresh lime juice fill it with addictive zingy flavor.
![Creamy potato soup - easy Soup Recipes]
#### [**Creamy Potato Soup**]
Can comfort food beâ€¦healthy? This recipe answers with a resounding, â€œYES!â€ Itâ€™s thick, creamy, and packed with smoky flavor, but itâ€™s entirely plant-based.
![Tortilla soup topped with avocado, radishes, and crispy tortilla strips]
#### [Vegetarian Tortilla Soup]
Potentially one of my all-time favorite soup recipes! A blended corn tortilla thickens its rich, flavorful tomato and chile broth.
![Best Black Bean Soup Recipe]
#### [Black Bean Soup]
This black bean soup is creamy, spicy, and satisfying, but best of all, itâ€™s really darn easy to make. It has a permanent spot in my regular recipe rotation, and I think it will in yours, too!
![Best Corn chowder]
#### **[Yellow Split Pea Soup]**
Yellow split peas mingle with fresh corn kernels in this vegan riff on corn chowder, making it extra-hearty and super fun to eat. Itâ€™s delicious on its own, but I like it even more with crispy, smoky [coconut bacon] on top!
## Easy Blended Soup Recipes
Traditional purÃ©ed soup recipes commonly call for butter, heavy cream, or whole milk, but you wonâ€™t find any of those ingredients in the creamy soups below. Instead, blended vegetables give each one its smooth, velvety texture. Yum!
![Acorn squash soup]
#### [Acorn Squash Soup]
Butternut isnâ€™t the only squash that can blend into a delicious soup!
![Homemade Tomato soup recipe]
#### [Tomato Basil Soup]
This rich, savory soup stars roasted fresh tomatoes instead of canned ones. I love to make it in late summer to preserve the last tomatoes of the season. It freezes perfectly!
![Sweet potato soup]
#### [**Sweet Potato Soup**]
Two bowls for me, please! Given that Iâ€™m a massive sweet potato fan, itâ€™s probably not surprising that I adore this soup. Itâ€™s tangy, sweet, and smoky, and the blended sweet potato gives it a mouthwatering velvety texture.
![Broccoli Cheese Soup]
#### **[Vegan â€œCheesyâ€ Broccoli Soup]**
Tasting this soup, youâ€™d never guess that itâ€™s totally dairy-free. Itâ€™s creamy, tangy, rich, and satisfyingâ€”everything cheesy broccoli soup should be!
![Tomato soup]
#### [Tomato Soup]
This classic tomato soup calls for basic pantry ingredients, so itâ€™s a staple in my kitchen all soup season long. Itâ€™s the perfect partner for a gooey [grilled cheese sandwich.]
![Easy soup recipes - Zucchini soup]
#### [Zucchini Soup]
The beauty of this soup isnâ€™t just its creamy texture, vibrant color, and bright, refreshing flavor. Itâ€™s also a breeze to make! On a busy weeknight, you can get it on the table in 30 minutes flat.
![Carrot Ginger Soup]
#### [Carrot Ginger Soup]
You only need 7 ingredients to make this energizing, refreshing carrot ginger soup!
![Healthy soup recipes - roasted red pepper soup]
#### [Roasted Red Pepper Soup]
A fan favorite from our [first cookbook], this bright red soup is super easy to make! Serve it with [homemade focaccia] for a quick, healthy, and comforting dinner.
![Cauliflower soup]
#### [Cauliflower Soup]
[Roasted garlic], shallots, and miso fill this creamy veggie soup with nutty, savory flavor.
## Homemade Curried Soup Recipes
If you have curry spices in your pantry, youâ€™re well on your way to making a flavorful pot of soup!
![Homemade soup recipes - Pumpkin soup]
#### [Pumpkin Soup]
This fall, Jack and I have eaten this ultra-creamy pumpkin soup more times than we can count. Still, weâ€™re nowhere near tired of it. Spices like turmeric, ginger, cumin, and cardamom pack it with warm curry flavor.
![Curry Lentil Soup]
#### [Curry Lentil Soup]
If you open your pantry, youâ€™ll likely find all the ingredients to this bright, warming, and weeknight-friendly lentil soup inside. Itâ€™s one of our favorites and a fan favorite, too!
![Coconut carrot gazpacho]
#### **[Carrot Coconut Soup]**
I think of this recipe as a â€œgazpachoâ€ because it comes together easily in the blender. Chill it if you want to eat it [gazpacho]-style, but if youâ€™re craving something warm, itâ€™s equally good after a few minutes on the stove.
## All About the Onions
Youâ€™ll find onions in almost every recipe in this post, but most often, theyâ€™re playing a supporting role. In the recipes below, theyâ€™re finally front and center, filling each soup with rich flavor.
![French onion soup]
#### [French Onion Soup]
This easy French onion soup recipe will rival any youâ€™ve had at a restaurant. Topped with crispy, cheesy baguette, itâ€™s rich, comforting, and packed with umami flavor.
![Best Mushroom Soup Recipe]
#### [Oyster Mushroom Soup]**
**
This brothy soup is light and nourishing, but that doesnâ€™t mean itâ€™s bland. A whole lotta [leeks] create its savory, umami base. Miso, lemongrass, celery, and ginger amp up its flavor even more.
![Potato Leek Chowder]
#### Vegan Potato, Leek & Artichoke Chowder, page 91 of [Love & Lemons Every Day]
This hearty soup is like a plant-based cross between potato leek soup and clam chowder.
## Nourishing Noodle Soup Recipes
You wonâ€™t find any chicken in these noodle soup recipes, but trust me, you wonâ€™t miss it. Each one is wholesome, energizing, and funâ€”the perfect pick-me-up for a cold, cloudy day, or anytime youâ€™re under the weather.
![Tortellini soup]
#### [Tortellini Soup]
Chewy, cheesy tortellini make this brothy soup a satisfying meal on its own. Serve it with dollops of [kale pesto] to take it over the top.
![Vegan ramen]
#### [Vegan Ramen]
Homemade [mushroom broth] creates a flavorful base for this savory, slurp-able vegan ramen.
![Pasta e fagioli]
#### [Pasta e Fagioli]
Filled with veggies, beans, and pasta, this classic Italian soup is a meal in a bowl! _Tip_: Toss a Parmesan rind into the simmering pot to add rich, umami flavor.
![Vegan Pho]
#### [Easy Vegetarian Pho]
In Austin, we lived just down the street from a Vietnamese restaurant that made the most amazing vegetarian pho. After ordering it on repeat for years, I finally developed my own version at home. Made with an aromatic broth, itâ€™s light, nourishing, and delicious.
![Minestrone]
#### [Minestrone Soup]
To me, classic minestrone soup is pure comfort. The herb-flecked tomato broth is so flavorful, and I love the way the chewy noodles play off the creamy beans and tender veggies.
![Homemade Lasagna Soup Recipe]
#### Lasagna Soup with Vegan Ricotta, page 93 of [Love & Lemons Every Day]**
**
Soup recipes donâ€™t get more fun than this vegan lasagna soup! I love eating through the big, curly, sloppy noodles. Tasty and nutritious, itâ€™s the perfect easy way to satisfy a weeknight [lasagna] craving.
## Brothy Veggie Soup Recipes
When Iâ€™m craving a light, fresh meal in the dead of winter, I make these brothy soup recipes. On a cold night, theyâ€™re the perfect way to eat your veggies, as theyâ€™re warming and comforting, but still packed with produce.
![Cabbage soup]
#### [Cabbage Soup]
If youâ€™ve had a head of cabbage hanging out in your fridge for a few days (ermâ€¦weeks), this easy soup is the perfect way to use it up. Itâ€™s bright and flavorful, and it uses an entire head of cabbage in one go.
![Kale soup]
#### [Kale Soup]
On the fence about kale? This recipe will make you a convert. The greens wilt down into a lightly creamy, rosemary-scented broth. Take one bite, and your bowl will be empty before you know it!
![Dumpling soup]
#### [Dumpling Soup]
Keep a bag of frozen potstickers on hand so that you can whip up this easy soup on weeknights. Filled with the chewy dumplings, spinach, mushrooms, and more, itâ€™s just as fun as takeoutâ€¦and even more flavorful.
![Ribollita]
#### [Ribollita]**
**
Donâ€™t let your day- (or days-) old bread go to waste! Instead, toss it into this hearty Tuscan white bean soup made with kale, carrots, or whatever veggies you like best.
![Miso soup recipe]
#### [Miso Soup]**
**
Craving a classic miso soup? This recipe is for you. It comes together in 20 minutes with just 7 basic ingredients.
![Lentil soup]
#### [Best Lentil Soup]
Earthy lentils, aromatic veggies, and a splash of vinegar add complex depth of flavor to this classic soup. If youâ€™re short on time, feel free to make my [Instant Pot Lentil Soup] instead.
![Easy Vegetable Soup Recipe]
#### [Vegetable Soup]
What veggies do you have in your fridge? No matter your answer, you can make this easy, flexible vegetable soup recipe.
![soup recipes]
![]
## 35 Best Soup Recipes
rate this recipe: 5 from 38 votes Prep Time: 10 minutes Cook Time: 30 minutes Total Time: 40 minutes Serves 4 to 6 [Save Recipe] [Print Recipe] This creamy potato soup is one of our favorite soup recipes!
### Ingredients
- 3 tablespoons [extra-virgin olive oil], divided
- 1 large white onion, chopped
- Â½ teaspoon sea salt
- 4 garlic cloves, chopped
- 1 tablespoon white wine vinegar
- 4 cups [vegetable broth], store bought or [homemade]
- 1Â½ pounds Yukon gold potatoes, about 5, chopped
- 1Â½ cups cooked white beans, drained and rinsed
- Â½ teaspoon Dijon mustard
- 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice
- Â¼ teaspoon smoked paprika
- Freshly ground black pepper
#### Optional Toppings
- Scallions or chives
- [Coconut bacon]
- Greek yogurt, optional
- Cheddar cheese, optional
Cook Mode Prevent your screen from going dark
### Instructions
- Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add the onion, salt, and several grinds of pepper. SautÃ© 6 to 8 minutes, until softened.
- Add the garlic, stir, and cook 2 more minutes. Stir in the white wine vinegar and cook, stirring, for 30 seconds, and then add the broth, potatoes, and white beans. Bring to a boil, reduce the heat, and simmer 30 minutes.
- Let cool slightly, then transfer half of the soup to a blender with the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil, the mustard, lemon juice, and paprika. Blend until smooth and return the pureed soup back to the pot.
- Use a potato masher to gently smash the potato chunks and beans. Season to taste with more salt and pepper and serve with desired toppings.

## Hello, we're Jeanine and Jack.
We love to eat, travel, cook, and eat some more! We create & photograph vegetarian recipes from our home in Chicago, while our shiba pups eat the kale stems that fall on the kitchen floor.
